ComicInfo.Summary:
The stage is set for the final showdown between Drake, Becky, Griselda, and Jesup. The fate of the world hangs in the balance. But Drake and Becky didn't stand a chance against Jesup when they were armed with the Six. How can they stop him when he now holds all of the doomsday weapons?
